title: Did the demonstrators burn the Minnesota flag and raise the anti-fascist flag in a local prison?
subtitle: The right-wing positions accurately describe the basic facts of a real accident that lasted about 30 minutes.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: On 14 August 2017, demonstrators removed the county flag from the Henebin District Prison in Minnesota and destroyed it, temporarily replacing it with the flag of Antiva.
